sourcesContent:
const hardCodedBlogs = [
    {
      id: 1,
      title: 'The Art of Time Management',
      content: 'In this blog post, we explore the importance of effective time management and offer tips for improving your productivity.',
      imageUrl: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,',
    },
    {
      id: 2,
      title: 'Exploring Remote Work: Pros and Cons',
      content: 'Discover the advantages and challenges of remote work in this comprehensive guide. Learn how to make the most of your remote work experience.',
      imageUrl: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,',
    },
    {
      id: 3,
      title: 'Travel Destinations Off the Beaten Path',
      content: 'Uncover hidden gems and less-traveled destinations around the world. Get inspired to explore new places on your next adventure.',
      imageUrl: 'https://example.com/travel.jpg',
    },
    {
      id: 4,
      title: 'Introduction to Sustainable Living',
      content: 'Learn about sustainable living practices and how you can reduce your environmental footprint. Small changes can make a big difference.',
      imageUrl: 'https://example.com/sustainable-living.jpg',
    },
    {
      id: 5,
      title: 'The Power of Mindfulness Meditation',
      content: 'Discover the benefits of mindfulness meditation and how it can improve your mental well-being. Start your mindfulness journey today.',
      imageUrl: 'https://example.com/mindfulness-meditation.jpg',
    },
    {
      id: 6,
      title: 'Building Healthy Eating Habits',
      content: 'Explore the world of healthy eating with nutritious recipes and tips for maintaining a balanced diet. Your health is your wealth.',
      imageUrl: 'https://example.com/healthy-eating.jpg',
    },
    {
      id: 7,
      title: 'Mastering the Art of Public Speaking',
      content: 'Overcome your fear of public speaking and become a confident communicator. Learn techniques to captivate your audience.',
      imageUrl: 'https://example.com/public-speaking.jpg',
    },
  ];
  
  export default hardCodedBlogs;
